Key Match Events: Hardik hit a left-hander's cover drive for power stripped to its purest essence
Rishad Hossain dismissed Rishabh Pant and took two wickets
Kuldeep Yadav took three wickets to derail Bangladesh's chase
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik and Kuldeep lead India to their second win in the Super Eight
India won by 50 runs, ensuring a possible qualification for the semi-finals if Australia beats Afghanistan
Bangladesh are on the brink of elimination after losing by 50 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli as a partnership has won many a match for India, but at this T20 World Cup, they are yet to click
Tanzim Hasan was unpredictable and Bangladesh's best bowler
Tanzid Hasan and Litton Das struggled early in the chase
Bangladesh actually ended up attacking more balls than India did in this game - 49 to 48, but a lot of them were panicked swings
